SECTION_2.BLURB_1: A laid back performance of acoustic music, usually suited to post ceremony canapés or to provide ambience for pre dinner drinks.
SECTION_2.BLURB_2: The modern day one man band, mixing live looping, guitars, piano, percussion and vocals.  A unique upbeat performance of timeless sing-a-long classics and party tunes, perfectly served as your post dinner live music entertainment.
SECTION_2.BLURB_3: As the light fades, party with your family and friends as The Music Guy delivers an eclectic mix of trusted floor fillers that’ll keep your guests singing and dancing into the early hours.
SECTION_2.BLURB_4: Whether it be a live performance of your favourite song as you walk down the aisle, ambient acoustic music, an upbeat live music performance or a DJ set - sourcing all of these key ingredients can prove a daunting task. The Music Guy takes the stress away. A one stop shop of musical expertise, The Music Guy can provide all of the above.
